IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PEDIATRIC RESPITE AND DEVELOPMENTAL SERVICES FOR CHILDREN WITH COMPLEX HEALTH CARE CONDITIONS. SERVICES INCLUDE STEP-DOWN NURSING SERVICES; EARLY CHILDHOOD EDUCATIONAL ENRICHMENT GROUPS; INDIVIDUALIZED SPECIAL EDUCATION SERVICES; PRESCHOOL AND/OR EARLY INTERVENTION THERAPIES; AND FAMILY SUPPORT SERVICES FOR CHILDREN AGES 4 MONTHS TO 5 YEARS OF AGE. DAYSTAR SUPPORTS UP TO 56 ENROLLEES DAILY, AND IS THE ONLY FULL-DAY PROGRAM AVAILABLE TO CHILDREN WHO HAVE COMPLEX MEDICAL CONDITIONS; REQUIRE ONGOING NURSING SUPERVISION AND CARE, AND/OR RELY ON MEDICAL DEVICES TO COMPENSATE FOR LIFE-SUSTAINING ACTIVITIES. DAYSTAR'S INNOVATIVE PROGRAM HAS BEEN RECOGNIZED BY NYS OFFICE OF CHILDREN AND FAMILY SERVICES AS A "BEST PRACTICES MODEL AND IS LAUDED AS A COST-EFFECTIVE ALTERNATIVE TO HOME-BASED HEALTH CARE SERVICES; RECOGNIZED AS A PROVEN PREVENTION STRATEGY TO MINIMIZE HOSPITALIZATION, AND AN ECONOMIC CATALYST, HELPING FAMILIES PRESERVE THEIR ECONOMIC INDEPENDENCE AND RETURN TO THE WORKFORCE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: DAYSTAR KIDS PROMOTES THE HEALTH CARE, THERAPEUTIC, EDUCATIONAL, AND SOCIAL GOALS FOR CHILDREN WHOSE DEVELOPMENT IS DISRUPTED BY HOSPITALIZATION AND/OR TREATMENT FOR THEIR COMPLEX HEALTH CARE CONDITIONS.
IRS990.Desc: DAYSTAR KIDS PROVIDES YEAR-ROUND, FULL-DAY SPECIALIZED PEDIATRIC RESPITE SERVICES TO CHILDREN WITH COMPLEX HEALTH CARE CONDITIONS RANGING IN AGE FROM 4 MONTHS TO 5 YEARS OLD AND EMPOWERS CHILDREN WITH THE SKILLS THEY NEED TO SUCCESSFULLY ENTER KINDERGARTEN WITH THEIR PEERS. IN 2022, DAYSTAR KIDS PROVIDED SKILLED PEDIATRIC NURSING SERVICES, EARLY CHILDHOOD AND SPECIAL EDUCATION PROGRAMS, HEALTH CARE COORDINATION, AND RELATED THERAPIES ONSITE TO 60 ENROLLEES FROM 13 DIFFERENT SCHOOL DISTRICTS IN THE GREATER ROCHESTER AREA. DAYSTAR KIDS' MULTIDISCIPLINARY PROGRAMS DAYSTAR KIDS HAVE AN AVERAGE OF 7 PRIMARY DIAGNOSES AND REQUIRE ONGOING NURSING SUPERVISION AND SUPPORT TO MAINTAIN THEIR HEALTH STATUS AND AVOID HOSPITALIZATION.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: DAYSTAR'S FAMILY SUPPORT SERVICES PROGRAM IS SUPPORTED BY NEW YORK STATE OFFICE FOR PEOPLE WITH WITH DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES AND PROVIDES ESSENTIAL CARE COORDINATION SERVICES, TRANSITIONAL SUPPORT SERVICES, PREVENTIVE HEALTHCARE SERVICES, HEALTHCARE NAVIGATION ASSISTANCE, FAMILY ADVOCACY, AND ESSENTIAL EDUCATION AND TRAINING SERVICES TO UP TO 86 FAMILIES ANNUALLY WHO CARE FOR AN INFANT OR CHILD WITH COMPLEX HEALTHCARE CONDITIONS AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES. DURING 2022, DAYSTAR SERVED 56 FAMILIES WHO WERE APPROVED FOR THIS SERVICE, EMPOWERING THEM TO EFFECTIVELY ADVOCATE AND MANAGE THEIR CHILD'S COMPLEX HEALTH CARE, SOCIAL-EMOTIONAL, AND EDUCATIONAL GOALS, WHILE SUPPORTING THEIR FAMILY'S NEED FOR ADDITIONAL CARE COORDINATION SUPPORTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: DAYSTAR'S EARLY INTERVENTION AND PRESCHOOL SPECIAL SERVICES PROGRAM CONSISTS OF A DEDICATED TEAM OF RELATED PROVIDERS EXPERT IN WORKING WITH CHILDREN WITH MEDICAL COMPLEXITY TO PROVIDE ASSESSMENTS, EVALUATION SERVICES, AND THERAPY SERVICES. THIS PROGRAM IMPROVES SERVICE INTEGRATION, LINKING DAYSTAR'S CURRICULUM, THERAPEUTIC GOALS, AND HEALTH CARE DIRECTIVES TO SUPPORT THE INDIVIDUALIZED NEEDS OF EACH PATIENT, AND CREATES UNPARALLELED CONTINUITY OF CARE BY MINIMIZING PATIENT TRANSITIONS AND DISRUPTION OF SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: REPRESENTATION AMONG NYS LEGISLATORS AND REGULATORS FOCUSED ON MATTERS OF IMPORTANCE TO YOUNG CHILDREN WITH DEVELOPMENTAL AND OTHER SERIOUS HEALTH DIAGNOSIS CONSISTENT WITH OUR MISSION.
ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE INTENDED TO SUPPORT FUTURE PROGRAM INITIAVIES IN ACCORDANCE WITH OUR ENDOWMENT SPENDING POLICY.
SEE DESCRIPTION OF NEW EARLY INTERVENTION AND PRESCHOOL SPECIAL SERVICES PROGRAM IN PART III LINE 4C.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN 2022, DAYSTAR DISSOLVED THE EXISTING MEMBERSHIP STRUCTURE OF DAYSTAR, SO THAT DAYSTAR BECOMES GOVERNED BY A SELF-PERPETUATING BOARD OF DIRECTORS. UNDER PREVIOUS MEMBERSHIP STRUCTURE, SISTERS OF SAINT JOSEPH OF ROCHESTER INC. WAS A MEMBER OF DAYSTAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DRAFT 990 WILL BE PRESENTED AT A MEETING OF THE FINANCE AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS; THE COMMITTEE WILL BE REQUIRED TO REVIEW AND A MOTION TO APPROVE THE FORM 990 WILL BE PRESENTED. IF THERE ARE CHANGES RECOMMENDED, STAFF WILL MAKE THE REQUESTED CHANGES AND PRESENT THEM TO THE COMMITTEE FOR ITS FINAL APPROVAL. ONCE APPROVED BY THE COMMITTEE, THE FORM 990 WILL BE PRESENTED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AT THE NEXT MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH DIRECTOR, OFFICER AND MEMBER OF A COMMITTEE WITH GOVERNING BOARD DELEGATED POWER SHALL ANNUALLY SIGN A STATEMENT WHICH AFFIRMS SUCH PERSON : HAS RECEIVED A COPY OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, HAS READ AND UNDERSTANDS THE POLICY, HAS AGREED TO COMPLY WITH THE POLICY, AND UNDERSTANDS THE AGENCY'S CHARITABLE MISSION. BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO FILE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE FORM ANNUALLY; STAFF ARE TRAINED ANNUALLY ON THE AGENCY'S CORPORATE COMPLIANCE AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICIES, AND ACTIVITIES ARE MONITORED QUARTERLY THROUGH THE AGENCY'S QUALITY ASSURANCE & CORPORATE COMPLIANCE OFFICER AND COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS OF THE AGENCY'S FINANCE AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEW ANNUAL SALARY LEVELS FOR ITS DIRECTORS AND ARE REQUIRED TO ANNUALLY REVIEW AND VOTE UPON THESE POSITIONS WITHIN THE ANNUAL OPERATING BUDGET. IN ADDITION, THE AGENCY CONTRACTS WITH PAYCHEX, A HUMAN RESOURCES AND PAYROLL MANAGEMENT FIRM. AS PART OF THE AGENCY'S ANNUAL CONTRACT, PAYCHEX PROVIDES DAYSTAR WITH A DEDICATED HR SPECIALIST, WITH WHOM THE AGENCY CONSULTS ON SUCH MATTERS. ADDITIONALLY, MEMBERS OF THE FINANCE/EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE ARE PROVIDED WITH DATA FROM THE ANNUAL NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS SALARY AND BENEFITS SURVEY FROM NY COUNCIL OF AGENCY EXECUTIVES FOR COMPARATIVE DATA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DAYSTAR'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE POSTED AT RECEPTION AND ARE AVAILABLE ONSITE UPON REQUEST.
NO CHANGES FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
